thread.title: Manchester City winger Leroy Sane APOLOGISES after his goal in Manchester City’s 5-3 Champions League win against Monaco costs one unlucky punter £30,000 – from a £1.50 bet
thread.title_full: Manchester City winger Leroy Sane APOLOGISES after his goal in Manchester City’s 5-3 Champions League win against Monaco costs one unlucky punter £30,000 – from a £1.50 bet

author: jhutchinson
title: Manchester City winger Leroy Sane APOLOGISES after his goal in Manchester City’s 5-3 Champions League win against Monaco costs one unlucky punter £30,000 – from a £1.50 bet
text:
EFL SORRY FOR SCORING Manchester City winger Leroy Sane APOLOGISES after his goal in Manchester City’s 5-3 Champions League win against Monaco costs one unlucky punter £30,000 – from a £1.50 bet 
Sane notched the fifth goal for City last night - the punter had City to win 4-3 in a double with Bayer Leverkusen vs Atletico Madrid by JOHN HUTCHINSON
